ALMOST.THERE: Almost there! Next time You'll got it.
ALRIGHT.YOU.MADE: You made it! Not bad, on time.
YOU.CORRECT: You got {{correct}} out of {{total}} questions right.
YOU.FAIL: You had some wrong answers, take a look at which they are.
MIN.WIDTH:
We're sorry, this application needs at least 320px width.
Try later with another device.
ANTICS.INTRO: We introduce Antic's Code Desktop a program with which you will be able to create content for this same portal. It is easier than you think, for this follow these simple steps:
ANTICS.CREATE: Take advantage of this opportunity and join an emerging community of developer. Create, Share, Learn and Meet new people interested in the fastest growing profession in the world.
ANTICS.APP: This application was made specially to write articles, so your experience while writing and sharing will be great and satisfactory.
ARTICLE.LOOKING: What sort of Articles are You Looking for?
RECOVER.INTRO: Have You forget your Password? Do not worry, here You can generate a new password. Simply use the button and We will send You a message into your mailbox. Check your junk if You cannot find the email.
SEND.RECOVER: I want to recover my Password
BAD.SCORE: Your score is a bit bad, maybe you should keep studying.
BIO.NOT.DEFINED: Not Defined. Write something about You
SUBJECT: Subject
WELCOME.INBOX: Welcome. Here you can send messages to other users and also read their messages. Take this opportunity to make contacts and friends who like the same as you. You never know where a good deal might come from.
USE.INBOX: Select the message you want to read on the left panel. Send a message back or just create a new one. Remember to keep in contact with your friends!
REFRESH.INBOX: The messages do not arrive live, so you will have to refresh them by using the green button.
ENJOY.INBOX: We hope you will make many contacts by using this service.

ARTICLE.MESSAGE: When the moderation team approves your Article, it will be listed along with the others. From that moment, any user will be able to read and learn from your content.
ARTICLE.SUBTITLE: Create and share content with other people interested in programming.
ARTICLE.TITLE: Your content

FORM.MESSAGE: Take your time to fill in the details of the Article. It is important to know how to choose well. The title will serve to create a unique link with which you can share the content.
FORM.SUBTITLE: A good Article contains a great variety of information.
FORM.TITLE: Article Creation

FORM-VALID.MESSAGE: Fill in the data, the more information you provide, the richer content it will be. Writing a good introduction is essential to attract readers, keep that in mind.
FORM-VALID.SUBTITLE: We take seriously maintaining the same format for all Articles.
FORM-VALID.TITLE: Fill the Data

INFO.MESSAGE: Add external links to increase the value of the Article. Leaving the reader at a standstill is something important to avoid as it leads to abandoning the application.
INFO.SUBTITLE: You can add links regarding the Article.
INFO.TITLE: Additional Information

MARKDOWN.MESSAGE: You will have a panel to write Makrdown and a preview of the Article. Don't worry if you need a break. If you exit the application, You can downupload the Article where you left it.
MARKDOWN.SUBTITLE: Use Markdown to write a rich Article.
MARKDOWN.TITLE: Let's do it

START.MESSAGE: One of the few requirements for writing in Antic's Code is knowing Markdown, everything else is up to you. Articles will be visible both here and in Antic's Code Desktop. What are you waiting to capture your knowledge?
START.SUBTITLE: Basic concepts for good writing.
START.TITLE: Write an Article

DELETE.ACCOUNT.P:
if you delete your account, your information that belongs to this portal will be erased, this includes your profile, your likes and article scores. This process cannot be undone.
Are you really sure you want to delete your account?
DELETE.SENTENCE: I am sure to delete my account, go ahead.
DESKTOP.INTRO: Do you find it interesting? Do you want to join a community of developers? Download Antic's Code now! It is totally free. You will need an Antic's Code account to enter.
DISCOVER.ARTICLES: Find, discover and learn with Articles and examples sorted by categories.
DISCOVER.LAST: Discover the latest of Antic's Code

DOWNLOAD.STEPS.SIX: Once approved, your Article is ready!
DOWNLOAD.STEPS.TWO: Login with your Antic's Code account
DOWNLOAD.STEPS.FIVE: Take your time to write something amazing.

NEW.PASSWORD: Welcome, from here You can create a new password for your account. Fill the form below. Then the next time use the same password to login.

ACCESS.MESSAGE: Access to this service has been denied for preventing from an unknown origin. Sorry for the inconvenience, if the problem persists, contact us.
ACCESS.TITLE: Access Error

CODE.MESSAGE: Sorry, there was a runtime error in the code. Please try to refresh the page if the error continues, otherwise contact us. Sorry for the disturbances.
CODE.TITLE: Code Error

ENTRY_DONE.MESSAGE: Hey hello! It's seems you already made this Test! Sorry, try with another if you wish.
ENTRY_DONE.TITLE: Test already made

REGISTER.MESSAGE: If you really want to sign up for a new account other than the one you already have, please log out first and try again.
REGISTER.TITLE: Already registered

EMAIL_TOKEN.MESSAGE: The code is invalid. Try again with another code.
EMAIL_TOKEN.TITLE: Access Denied

REQUEST.MESSAGE: There was an error verifying the data. Please check the entered data and try again. If the problem persists, contact us.
REQUEST.TITLE: Data Error

SHARE.MESSAGE: We are sorry. This device doesn't support the Web API Share. Please try again with another device, this usually works on mobile devices.
SHARE.TITLE: Share Not Available

SERVER.MESSAGE: There has been an internal error on the server. If the error continues, please try again later or contact us. Sorry for the disturbances.
SERVER.TITLE: Server Error

TEST.MESSAGE: We apologize, this feature makes use of your information as a user. You must be registered to access it.
TEST.TITLE: Access Denied

TOKEN.MESSAGE: Your token to access Antic's Code has expired, but do not worry, we have updated it for you. You can continue using the page as always.
TOKEN.TITLE: Acces Expired

UNKNOWN.MESSAGE: We don't know yet but something bad happened. Sorry for the inconvenience, if the problem persists, contact us.
UNKNOWN.TITLE: Unkown error

WEB.MESSAGE: There seems to be a network error. Check that you have Internet access and try again. If the problem persists, contact us.
WEB.TITLE: Network Error

USER_ALREADY.MESSAGE: We are sorry, this email is already in use. Please use another one.
USER_ALREADY.TITLE: User registered

FIND.ANY: Search, find any kind of related articles, tutorials, code, videos...
GOOD.SCORE: Congratulations! You approved with a good score. Keep it doing!
GREAT.SCORE: Woah! This is good enough for you, isn't it? You <strong>approved</string> with a great score. Awesome!
LABEL: Label
LIKED.WHY: Discover why these Articles are the most loved

ME.BUILD:
I personally built this site to help myself share content in a simple and beautiful way with other people interested in programming.
Do you think I did a good job? If you think so, surely you can benefit from my knowledge and experience in one way or another.
If you want to contact me you can do so at the bottom of this page or using the button in the lower left corner.
ME.INTRO:
My name is Sergio Mart√≠nez and I am the creator of this site. My idea was to have my own space to share my knowledge about programming using the technologies I know how to use.
Join me to get to know the person behind all this a little better. It should be noted that the system is built entirely from scratch, without using content management libraries or other similar software.
ME.LIKE:
You like what you see? Do you think I can be useful in any of your projects? I have created this site with passion and it is just an example of what I can do. Although my specialty is Angular/Ionic, I am open to all kinds of technologies related to modern web development.
If you are interested, you can send me a message and tell me your story and why you want me to be in it, we will surely reach an agreement.
ME.QUOTE: My main objective is to use my knowledge to develop Software that helps other people or entities to be better every day. Thanks to this and with a lot of effort someday I will fulfill one of my goals, to be a recognized programmer.

ANGULAR.MESSAGE: Creation of web applications of all kinds, modular, readable, reusable.

BOOTSTRAP.MESSAGE: Grid, responsive, mobile first, classes, flex-box, interface design.

CSS.MESSAGE: Cascade, inheritance, box-model, flex-box, layouts, interfaces, SCSS.

EXPRESS.MESSAGE: Creation of servers, REST API, controllers, middlewares, JWT.

GIT.MESSAGE: Corporate environment to work in various development environments.

HEROKU.MESSAGE: Deployment of applications to the cloud, administration, monitoring.

HTML.MESSAGE: Layout, structure, indentation, readable, standards, accessibility.

IONIC.MESSAGE: Creation, expansion and correction of applications for mobile phones.

JQUERY.MESSAGE: Understand and execute scripts of all kinds for certain functionalities.

JS.MESSAGE: Clean, Ecmascript, logical, reactive, readable, async-wait, operations.

MONGO.MESSAGE: Design and manage non-relational databases based on JSON.

NODE.MESSAGE: Environment, use of npm packages, dependencies, updates, libraries.

PHP.MESSAGE: Connections, form submission, processing and displaying data.

RXJS.MESSAGE: Observables, data flow, pipes, operators, functional, flow management.

SQL.MESSAGE: Administration and database design, entity-relationship model.

TS.MESSAGE: Classes, interfaces, typing, readable, autocomplete, avoid errors.

VSC.MESSAGE: Extensions, emmet, keyboard shortcuts, integrated terminal.

WORDPRESS.MESSAGE: Installation, administration, maintenance, editing, design, writing content.

TIME.BORN: I was born in a privileged place, Barcelona . In the last century, this city has been one of the great technological references worldwide, especially thanks to the well-known 'Mobile World Congress'
TIME.CIM: At the CIM foundation, part of the Polytechnic University of Catalonia, I learned to connect the web pages that I liked so much to databases, increasing their degree of complexity.
TIME.COLLAGE:
My walk through the institute was quite normal. It should be noted that in one of those years, I got first place in a contest for the best story on the day of Sant Jordi.
I spoke about the human being and abstract thought.
TIME.FIRST: I created my first web page in the computer classes of the institute and to this day I have not stopped learning and creating new things.
TIME.ITA: History repeats itself, it seems that technology is faster than me. I left my job which had nothing to do with this matter to try again to study web programming, my true passion, this time in an academy called IT Academy Barcelona.
TIME.JOB:
Thanks to IT Academy Barcelona I finally found a job in a software development company.
From here I give thanks to all the people who helped me get to this moment. Greetings to all of them.
TIME.KEEP:
I'm still working as a software developer, right now although away from the office. In this time I have learned more about Angular and also working as a team with other developers.
Coordinating with the other teams involved in development is essential to keep a good pace of work.
TIME.MORE: I followed the path I had taken and continued my studies in technology, however this time with higher studies in computing and telecommunications.
TIME.SCHOOL: At school I was one of the first to learn multiplication tables from memory, and the faculty of teachers thought about taking me a whole course ahead of time because of the results I was giving. Which it didn't happen in the end.
TIME.STUDY: I left the path aside to venture into Vocational Training. I decided on the technological branch starting with the most basic, electricity and electronics.

TASK.ONE: Develop specific solutions for various types of applications.
TASK.TWO: Coordinate the different teams that are related to the Frontend development.

TASK.ONE: Give technological solutions to other companies using software.
TASK.TWO: Agile, fast and efficient development. Average delivery time, 3 months.

MOBILE.INTRO: Do you want to create content from anywhere? Now with Antic's Code Mobile it is possible. Download the application, you can create and edit your content at any place.

MAINTENANCE.MESSAGE: We are working on improving the page and some parts may not work properly. Sorry for the inconvenience, we continue to develop so that everything returns to normal as soon as possible. Thanks for your understanding.
MAINTENANCE.TITLE: Maintenance

NAME: Name
NO.TEST.YET: There's no test for this category
NO.ENTRY.YET: There's no Entries for this category
NO.WRITE.YET: I ain't write anything yet. I'm on it!
RESULT.INTRO: Below you can see the result of the test you have done. These data are merely informative so don't take it too seriously.
PERFECT.SCORE: I ain't have words to say. You approved with a perfect score. Unbelievable!
QUESTION: Questions

DATA.HELPS.STARS: Giving a Star helps {{author}} to be more respected.
DATA.HELPS.LIKES: Giving a Like helps {{author}} to write more articles.

SORRY.RESULTS: We're sorry, your research does not match any of the criteria provided.
SUBSCRIBE.SUB: Subscribe to get update and information. Don't worry, we won't send spam!
TAKE.LOOK: Take a look to our Categories

TERMS.FIVE: The content of the portal is strictly oriented to a technological audience of any level, especially focused on web development with Javacript. It is also a good place to learn from scratch some modern web technology.
TERMS.FOUR: Remember to maintain a healthy attitude when interacting with other users. We all want to learn. You can also teach something to others.
TERMS.ONE: The use of this portal is completely free. You do not need an account to be able to see it's content.
TERMS.THREE: Your data will be used exclusively for the use of this portal. In no case will it be given to third parties. Sensitive data such as passwords are encrypted, only you will have access to them.
TERMS.TWO: With an account on your own, You will be able to interact with the portal, track your learning as You use it. You'll have access to your own profile which you can share to show others what you're made of.

TEST.INTRO: Prove your skills with the following Test about our Categories. You can check the result after the test or in your Profile. Other people will know of what are You made!

TESTIMONIALS.ONE: A fantastic place, to carry good practices. Antic's Code helps me stay current in the tech industry.
TESTIMONIALS.THREE: I know few places where you can easily share information, and Antic's Code is one of the best.
TESTIMONIALS.TWO: Using Antic's Code is really easy, I have found all the necessary items without getting lost. It is the best place to write your Article.
